meta.title: Benny Liu
meta.subtitle: 先完成，再完美！简单化，标准化，流程化！
meta.description: 前端 js ts electron react
meta.author: liubailing

pages.text: .clearfix{zoom:1}.clearfix:after{content:".";display:block;height:0;visibility:hidden;clear:both}.content{display:block;padding:5px 50px}.box{float:left;display:block;padding:5px 20px;margin-right:5px;border:1px #ddd solid;max-width:300px}h1{text-align:center}h3{font-size:14px}.block{background:#ccc}.aside{width:100px;height:100px;background:orange}.main{background:#ff0}.pos{position:relative;background:red;overflow:hidden}.pos1{position:absolute;padding:2px}.floatBox .block{margin-top:30px}.floatBox .aside{float:left}.posBox .block{position:relative}.posBox .aside{position:absolute;top:0;left:0}.posBox .main{margin-left:100px}.flexBox .block{display:flex}flex:布局1.子元素总宽度 大于 父级宽度的时候，（会自适应，这个就有点蛋疼了）aside11main三display:高度坍塌1.行内元素height weight 不能生效。aside main2.行内元素水平方向的margin-left; margin-right;;可以生效。但是竖直方向的margin-bottom; margin-top; 却不能生效。aside main3行内元素水平方向的padding-left; padding-right;可以生效。但是竖直方向的 padding-top; padding-bottom;却不能生效。aside main以上问题都可以 通过（ inline-block）不过这个好像有点过了~!~就好像说病人的腿有毛病想医治，结果医生直接把腿换了，虽然换腿也是医治，但...float:高度坍塌1.在父元素结束前添加一个宽高为0，clear:both 的空divasidemain2.为父元素添加overflow: hiddenasidemain3.使用after伪对象清除浮动asidemainposition:高度坍塌1.父级元素设高度，（废话）asidemain2.父级：overflow: hidden, 给第二个div设置margin-top且值设为大于等于固定定位模块的高度,(灰常鸡肋)asidemain3.给第二个div设置margin-top且值设为大于等于固定定位模块的高度,height: 1px; visibility: hidden;(灰常鸡肋)asidemain4.给父级元素设置line-height:且值设为大于等于固定定位模块的高度,（副作用大...）asidemain

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"More info: WritingRun server1$ hexo serverMore info: ServerGenerate static files1$ hexo generateMore info: GeneratingDeploy to remote sites1$ hexo deployMore info: Deployment
